(1) Offence moved from the lower tier (£50) to the upper tier (£80) on 5th March 2004.
(2) Offence moved from the lower tier (£50) to the upper tier (£80) on 1st November 2004.

(3) Offence added with effect from 1 November 2004. Penalty notices are no longer available for theft of goods valued at over £100 and may only be used for criminal damage up to a value of £300 from July 2009 onwards.
(4) Offence added with effect from 11 October 2004.
(5) Offence added with effect from 04 April 2005.
(6) Offence added with effect from 27 January 2009.
(7) Offence added with effect from 30 June 2012.
